marklogic.body:
I knew it! You can tell as his face is slimmer.
Will the bulbous, cellulite infested slob and lard a s s Chris Mathews match this Weight loss?
Personally, I am thrilled. We as a nation love this guy and care about his health. I know Moo'chelle will, out of kindness and thoughtfulness, want to send him some of her diet Moo'lade and a box of Sliced apple treats. It would be nice of her to gift the man we'd like to see kick her and her awful husband out of the White House for.
